Text: RE IEA MinisterialOECD Ministerial Cc Thank you for this good news I will come back to you early in the New Year to provide more information on how this is developing Best for the Season WCRamsay Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday December PM To RAMSAY William IEAEXD Cc Subject IEA MinisterialOECD Ministerial Hi Mr Ramsay In regard to your request for Ken to chair a Forum segment and join the Ministerial dinner with the Chair of the other Session in May he said that he would be delighted to participate We look forward to receiving additional information after the Governing Board has its meeting Rosalee
